duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide input into the design and conduct of clinical trials, reviewing and/or generating key study documents.
Assess and interpret safety data, and contribute to investigator, other site staff and clinical study team training.
Review and analyze the eligibility of participants per inclusion/exclusion requirements of a clinical trial.
Conduct 24/7 emergency coverage for safety-related matters.

education_certification.credential: DO, MD or equivalent required with Board Certification in a medical specialty /subspecialty and a current California medical license.
